item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, April 1, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. DEDA – Tracking Dots Extraction, Decoding and Anonymisation Toolkit (89 points | 18 comments)
2. Electron band structure in germanium, my ass (681 points | 285 comments)
3. Shared DNA in Music (52 points | 4 comments)
4. Bletchley code breaker Betty Webb dies aged 101 (309 points | 52 comments)
5. Dave Täht has died (121 points | 19 comments)
6. Show HN: Offline SOS signaling+recovery app for disasters/wars (12 points | 1 comment)
7. Glubux's Powerwall (2016) (338 points | 214 comments)
8. The Myst Graph: A New Perspective on Myst (138 points | 29 comments)
9. Show HN: Zig Topological Sort Library for Parallel Processing (74 points | 25 comments)
10. Hightouch (YC S19) Is Hiring Front End Engineers ( | hide)
11. Generate autounattend.xml files for Windows 10/11 (110 points | 33 comments)
12. Show HN: Qwen-2.5-32B is now the best open source OCR model (102 points | 30 comments)
13. Show HN: Nue – Apps lighter than a React button (663 points | 478 comments)
14. The April Fools joke that might have got me fired (401 points | 202 comments)
15. RubyUI (Former PhlexUI): Ruby Gem for RubyUI Components (105 points | 24 comments)
16. Systems Correctness Practices at AWS: Leveraging Formal and Semi-Formal Methods (110 points | 25 comments)

18. AI image recognition detects bubble-like structures in the universe (7 points | 1 comment)
19. The atrocious state of binary compatibility on Linux and how to address it (5 points | 1 comment)
20. Cuneiforms: New digital tool for translating ancient texts (20 points | 3 comments)
21. Excitable cells (249 points | 39 comments)
22. Show HN: Textcase: A Python Library for Text Case Conversion (3 points | discuss)
23. Show HN: Make SVGs interactive in React with 1 line (28 points | 15 comments)
24. Show HN: Duolingo-style exercises but with real-world content like the news (406 points | 158 comments)
25. A look back: WordPerfect on DOS (2023) (16 points | 21 comments)
26. Debts, Tech and Otherwise (30 points | 9 comments)
27. CERN scientists find evidence of quantum entanglement in sheep (277 points | 92 comments)
28. Show HN: Terminal dashboard that throttles my PC during peak electricity rates (75 points | 53 comments)
29. US Marines to get high-speed, radar-evading electric seagliders for rescue ops (121 points | 79 comments)
30. A deliberate practice app for guitar players who want to level up (434 points | 131 comments)
